name: UniGem
description:
Fred the Unicorn's bag had a hole in it, and he lost all of his gems! He needs your help to collect them all.

Assets Used:

  • Free Elf House 3D Low Poly Pack (by Free Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets))
  • Free Medieval Proops 3D Low Poly Models (by Free Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets))
  • Free Environment Props 3D Low Poly Pack (by Free Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets))
  • Low Poly Tree Pack (by Broken Vector)
